title: Cherry-Blossom at Horinji
marks: Signature, Seals, and Marks L center
description: ten lines of delicate, very neat and carefully written and spaced calligraphy; first line is short at the top and followed by red/orange square relief tamp; majority of lines are indented from the top; last two lines are higher, matching first line; last line followed by red/orange square intaglio stamp and red/orange square relief stamp; mounted on white mat
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
